reviews.review_msg: She has her own criterion and won't explain that to you. It means you never know how you fail this course. Probably the worst teacher Ive ever met. Though she is a nice person.

Very helpful especially during office hours. Gives very good feedback. need to be a good presenter and study hard. Hardly teaches anything in class. Will make you do a lot of team work and project, email assignment. She will make you work for the marks. Tough grader indeed. Get ready to study on your own. Got a B though had to work for it.

She is approchable. Tough grader indeed. Please be prepared to read on your own if you take her course. As she will make you do a lot of group work . emails etc. please be good in presentation. and participation and attendence matters!
